QuestData.Title: You Have Their Orders
QuestData.Description: The Horde is an army, make no mistake. And armies need orders.$b$bSomeone must be giving orders here. They know the plan, and I want to know the plan too.$b$bLook for the people who seem to be in charge and see if you can uncover any intelligence so we know what to do next.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I heard him conveying orders. Start with him, but beware of his magic!
QuestData.RewardText: The Banshee Queen is not like the previous Warchiefs.
